title: Real Peace in history: Jesus and Mary
description: What Does the Quran Say About Jesus, Mary, and the Trinity? | Quranic Insights In this video, we explore powerful Quranic verses addressing major theological questions and misconceptions. Topics covered include: The Concept of Trinity in Islam Was Jesus Crucified? Is Jesus the Son of God? Who Were the Parents of Adam and Eve? Was Mary a Virgin? Discover how the Quran responds to these important issues with clarity and depth. Whether you're Muslim, Christian, or simply curious, this video offers insightful comparisons and a deeper understanding of Islamic beliefs about key figures and events.

title: Former Priest Converts to Islam
description: A former priest from South Africa converted to Islam after a dream and converted his church, with thousands of followers joining him.

title: The Hidden History of Christmas
description: An exploration of the origins and evolution of Christmas traditions, examining historical and cultural influences.

title: Abu Ubayda's 10 Beautiful Bangla Naat
description: A collection of ten beautiful Bangla naats performed by Abu Ubayda, showcasing the rich tradition of Islamic devotional music.

title: Surah Mulk - Calming Recitation
description: A soothing recitation of Surah Mulk, offering spiritual tranquility and reflection through the beautiful voice of the reciter.
